CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Pewter
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.label: pewter
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.description: Pewter is a refined alloy formed by blending Tin with Copper. Known for its soft, workable nature and a muted, classic luster, pewter has been a favored material for decorative and utilitarian objects since ancient times.
